findings.title: Ability for project owners to replace the TerminalV1 using the migration functionality
findings.description: Project owners can create their implementation of ITerminalV1 with any logic they want, grant the migration allowance and execute the migration, allowing them to reconfigure the main management contract of the project, add logic mint/burn tickets, and control the project funds.

findings.title: Redundant gas consumption in contracts code functions
Unused Events
findings.description: Events like AddToBalance, AllowMigration, Migrate, Configure are declared but do not exist and do not emit in the deployed contract.

findings.title: Unused Events in ITerminal Interface
findings.description: Events like Deposit and others are declared in the ITerminal interface but never emit.
